contents.text: Donna Gregory has arranged an appointment with Mr . Thomas , her new business partner , She is now calling to cancel the arrangement . But Mr . Thomas isn’t  in his office . His secretary answers her phone instead .
contents.text_zh: 堂娜・格雷戈里与她新的商业合作伙伴托马斯先生有一个约会，她现在正在打电话取消这个安排，但是托马斯先生不在他的办公室，他的秘书替他接了电话。

contents.text: Good morning . Wilson Associates .
contents.text_zh: 早上好，这里是威尔逊公司。

contents.text: This is Donna Gregory speaking .  I’d like to speak to Mr . Thomas , please .
contents.text_zh: 我是堂娜·格雷戈里，请问托马斯先生在吗？

contents.text: I’m sorry ,  but Mr . Thomas left the office a few minutes ago .
contents.text_zh: 对不起，托马斯先生几分钟以前刚刚离开办公室了。

contents.text: That’s too bad ! I’ve been trying to call him for the last ten minutes . but your line has been busy . Will he be back soon ?
contents.text_zh: 真糟糕！我刚オー直打他的电话，足足打了10分钟，但一直都占线。他会马上回来吗？

contents.text: I’m afraid not . He’s gone for the rest of the day .
contents.text_zh: 我想不会，他今天一整天都不会回来了。

contents.text: Is there anywhere I can reach him ?
contents.text_zh: 那我到哪儿可以找到他呢？

contents.text: I don’ t believe so . He’s going to the suburbs on business . Is there any message I can give him ?
contents.text_zh: 我也不太清楚。他因公事到城郊去了。您有什么口信要我转给他吗？

contents.text: I had a business appointment with him for tomorrow morning at ten o’clock but I’m afraid I can’t make it .
contents.text_zh: 我明天上午10点与他有个商业约会，但我可能去不了了。

contents.text: Would you care to make another appointment?
contents.text_zh: 你可以改个时间吗？

contents.text: Unfortunately , I’m leaving town rather unexpectedly . and I may be gone for several days .
contents.text_zh: 很不巧，我突然要出城几天、可我也不太确定。

contents.text: I see . I can tell Mr . Thomas that you phoned .
contents.text_zh: 明白了，我可以转告托马斯先生您打电话来了。

contents.text: I wanted to speak to him before I left .
contents.text_zh: 我想在我离开之前能跟托马斯先生谈谈。

contents.text: If it is urgent , you might try his mobile phone .
contents.text_zh: 如果很急的话，您可以打他的手机。

contents.text: Yes , I tried . But his phone was not in service . Could you tell me his home telephone number , please ?
contents.text_zh: 是的，我打过了，但是他的手机不在服务区内。你能告诉我他家的电话吗？

contents.text: His home number is 5785–4758.
I can reach him , I presume , around eight o’clock ?
contents.text_zh: 我猜我该可以联系到他的，他八点应该在家吧？

contents.text: Possibly .I’m not sure what time you can reach him .
contents.text_zh: 可能在，我也不太确定你什么时候以联系到他。

contents.text: In any case , thank you for your trouble . If I don’t reach him at his home, you’ll tell him , of course , that l called ?
contents.text_zh: 无论如何，麻烦你了。如果我找不到他，请替我转告一声我打过电活，好吗？

contents.text: I certainly will , Good-bye.
contents.text_zh: 当然，我会的。再见。
